text: The was held on 31 October 2021. It was the first general election in the Reiwa era, ending the nine-year Shinzo Abe era and a controversial Suga Cabinet. The ruling party, the LDP, is projected to win a sole majority, passing the 233 seats needed. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Elections in Japan Category:October 2021 events Category:General elections Category:2021 in Japan Category:2021 elections in Asia
title: 2021 Japanese general election
